nodes.text: The Kiltirin-class dungeon ship was a Rendili StarDrive starship that was a scaled-down version of the Lictor-class dungeon ship.
The Kiltirin-class measured 150 meters in length and could carry up to 1,250 prisoners. It was armed with five quad turbolaser batteries and a single tractor beam projector.
Vanquisher was a modified Kiltirin-class dungeon ship used as slave ship by the Mytaranor Slaving Council.
